GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: oss: Fix negative period/buffer sizes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.4.295 by commit be8869d388593e57223ad39297c8e54be632f2f2. For more details please see the references link.
